}}'''''Wyrmvater Glaurung''''' is the sixth track of the album [[Dol Guldur (album)|Dol Guldur]] by the band [[Summoning]]. The song name is taken from [[Glaurung]], the first of the [[dragons]] and one of the foremost lieutenants of [[Morgoth]] during the [[First Age]].
[[Category:Songs by Summoning]]
